name: Escape: The Endless Dogwatch
description:
An Adventure Like No Other

January, 1928. The SS Carolina is lost deep in the ocean. There's a deadly chill outside. The captain is hiding something from you. By night 2 you're attacked and the crew is missing! It's a nightmare!


You play as 2nd Officer Walton. Explore the ship, use items, find the crew, and try to survive! You must get back to land and not let the ship sink.

This is a completely new experience from the creators of SimAirport and SimCasino!

Key Features

  • A point and click adventure game with a horror twist!
  • Beautiful, retro pixel art style with a nautical theme!
  • Hunt for crucial items and use them to survive and rid the curse!
  • Classically designed logical game mechanics with a modern UI for a satisfying experience.
  • Discover the truth and unlock multiple endings!
